# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia

using Base.Threads, Pkg
Pkg.add("ThreadsX")

function pig_latin(str::String)
    match = lastmatch(r"^((\p{L})(\p{Ll}âˆ—))", str)
    return match[2]*match[3]^(string(match[1], str[length(match[1])+1:end]))
end

function pig_latinify(v::Vector{String})
    @threads for i in 1:length(v)
        v[i] = pig_latin(v[i])
    end
end

# Testing
v = ["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"]
pig_latinify(v)
println(v)

```
